title: Tycoon Prototype 1
description: Build your business empire! Click to earn money and buy upgrades to automate your income.

title: Space Trader
description: Navigate the galaxy and trade commodities between planets to build your fortune!

title: Dungeon Crawler
description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons, fight enemies, collect gold, and find the exit to advance through levels.

title: Puzzle Forge
description: Classic 15-puzzle sliding tile game. Arrange numbered tiles in order by sliding them into the empty space.

title: City Builder Lite
description: Build your city with houses, shops, parks, and factories. Manage money, population, and happiness!

title: Card Battler
description: Strategic card battle game! Play cards, attack enemies, and defeat your opponent in turn-based combat.

title: Tower Defense
description: Defend your base by strategically placing towers along the enemy path. Survive 15 waves to win!

title: Idle Miner
description: Click to mine gold and build a mining empire! Hire miners, buy upgrades, and watch your profits grow automatically.

title: Racing Dash
description: Fast-paced racing game! Dodge traffic and rack up points. Use arrow keys to steer.

title: Platform Runner
description: Jump across platforms and avoid obstacles! Press SPACE or up arrow to jump.
